import React, { useState, useEffect } from 'react' import Customer_layout from '../../../pages/customer_layout'; const Cart = () => { const [ cart, setCart ] = useState(JSON.parse(localStorage.getItem('cart'))); const [ total, setTotal ] = useState([]); const a = []; console.log(total); const onDelete = (index) => { const result = cart.splice(1,index); setCart(result); if (result === []) { localStorage.setItem('cart', []); } else { localStorage.setItem('cart', JSON.stringify(result)); } } useEffect(() => { const totalPrice = () => { const sida = []; for(let product of cart){ sida.push(parseInt(product.price)); } console.log(sida); const sum = sida.reduce((a,b) => {return a + b},0); a.push(sum); console.log(a); console.log(total); console.log(sum); document.querySelector('#cartTotal').innerHTML = "abc"; } totalPrice(); }, []) const section = <>
Home / Cart
{cart.map((product, index) => { return( ) })}
Image Product Price Quantity Total Remove
{product.name} {product.price} {product.count} {product.count * product.price}

Enter your coupon code if you have one.

Cart Totals

Total
return ( <> ) } export default Cart
